events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and I want to return it for a refund because it is not what I purchased.
The system has classified this case under the Refund category based on the customer's request for a return and money back.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request to address the issue promptly.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong product. I'll do my best to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received to help us verify your claim?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I attached a clear photo showing the wrong item that was shipped to me.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a return shipping label at no cost and issue a full refund once we receive the returned item.
Thanks for the quick response and the refund offer. I appreciate your help and look forward to resolving this soon.
The return label has been sent to your email, and we will process the refund promptly once the package is received by our warehouse.
Just checking in to confirm that you have sent the return package and if there is anything else we could help you with.
Your refund has been fully processed and the case is now closed. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey. Please take a moment to provide feedback about your support experience.
